# SCNParticleInputMode.overOtherProperty

**Case**

The controller’s effect on a particle property is a function of another of the particle’s properties.

## Declaration

```swift
case overOtherProperty
```

## Discussion

Use the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNParticlePropertyController/inputProperty] property to specify the input property, and the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNParticlePropertyController/inputBias] and [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNParticlePropertyController/inputScale] properties to refine the relationship between a range of property values into a range of input values for the controller’s animation.

## Constants

- **SCNParticleInputMode.overLife**: The controller’s effect on a particle property is a function of the time since the particle’s birth.
- **SCNParticleInputMode.overDistance**: The controller’s effect on a particle property is a function of the particle’s distance from the position of a specified node.
